#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn bitnet_ffi::bitnet_create_context(config: *const BitNetConfigFFI) -> *mut BitNetContext

#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn bitnet_ffi::bitnet_destroy_context(ctx: *mut BitNetContext)

#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn bitnet_ffi::bitnet_load_model(ctx: *mut BitNetContext, path: *const c_char) -> i32

#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn bitnet_ffi::bitnet_generate(ctx: *mut BitNetContext, prompt: *const c_char, output: *mut c_char, output_len: usize) -> i32

#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn bitnet_ffi::bitnet_get_last_error() -> *const c_char

#[no_mangle]
pub extern "C" fn bitnet_ffi::bitnet_version() -> *const c_char

#[repr(C)]
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI::batch_size: u32
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI::device_id: i32
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI::max_seq_len: u32
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI::temperature: f32
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI::top_k: u32
pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetConfigFFI::top_p: f32

pub struct bitnet_ffi::BitNetContext
